    import Logger from 'francy-js/src/util/logger.js'
    public class | source

    Logger

    This class is a singleton that provides a logger for the Francy application.

    Constructor Summary

    Public Constructor
    public

    constructor(verbose: *)

    Singleton: Creates an instance of the logger and will returned that instance, everytime a new instance is requested.

    Member Summary

    Public Members
    public

    console: *

    public

    verbose: *

    Method Summary

    Public Methods
    public

    debug(message: *)

    Creates a [DEBUG] entry in the console log
    public

    error(message: *, error: *)

    Creates a [ERROR] entry in the console log
    public

    info(message: *)

    Creates a [INFO] entry in the console log
    public

    warn(message: *, error: *)

    Creates a [WARN] entry in the console log

    Public Constructors

    public constructor(verbose: *) source

    Singleton: Creates an instance of the logger and will returned that instance, everytime a new instance is requested.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    verbose *

    prints extra log information to console.log, default false

    public console: * source

    public verbose: * source

    Public Methods

    public debug(message: *) source

    Creates a [DEBUG] entry in the console log

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    message *

    the message to print

    public error(message: *, error: *) source

    Creates a [ERROR] entry in the console log

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    message *

    the message to print
    error *

    the error Object to attach to the message

    Creates a [INFO] entry in the console log

    Params:

    the message to print

    Creates a [WARN] entry in the console log

    error *
